about_the_game:
Close your eyes. (Now I understand you can't actually close your eyes and read this, But....) Close your eyes, and open your third eye. The year is 2140. Elon made it to Mars.
Bitcoin became the dominant world currency. And A.I.'s technology advanced to the level of genetically engineering the perfect human. But despite all of this, mankind still found a way of completely destroying Earth's atmosphere.

Enter you. A hero, not afraid to take on a few carbs. Yeah you're a bit chubby, But that doesn't stop you platforming your way across the Neon Wastelands. Life and Death are now as one. And in the likely event you actually do die. Your soul is instantly uploaded to the Cloud.

The Cloud
Here you must capture soul fragments to regenerate your life. Once you have collected enough soul fragments, A shop becomes available. You can now purchase various upgrades and synthesize yourself a new organic host. But beware! you can also die in the Cloud.
Dying in the Cloud will cast you down to the 2nd level of death.
I think you see where this is going? Yes, 7 levels of death. Each level challenging you with a completely different style and genre of gameplay.

.
.

2nd level of death
Scramble your way through an electrified maze all while racing against the clock. Every time you touch an electric wall your time will be reduced. Caution! if you touch the red laser beams you die instantly.

.
.

3rd level of death
Survival is the name of the game. You must take control of your armour-plated vehicle, we call them 'Runners'. Fight your way to salvation in an old school Shoot 'Em Up.

.
.

4th level of death
Your brain will have to get you out of this one. Answer enough questions right to complete the Slightly Overweight Superhero Quiz show.

.
.

5th level of death
Ever wanted to swing through a relentless barrage of spiralling neon walls?
Well, this is the stage for you. Here, you must time the gap, release your hero. And collect all 30 soul fragments to avoid the ever-present hammer of fate.

.
.

6th level of death
It's time to shake your money maker. Tap your way to the rhythm and shred yourself a heart pumping victory. All while listening to 3 Unreleased tracks from Australian Rock Band 'Birds of the Sun'.

.
.

Then the 7th level of death, your last chance at life. Let's just say, it's something you have to experience for yourself.

.
.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains cartoonish Blood and mild sexual innuendos within text dialogue.

name: Slightly Overweight Superhero and the seven levels of death
short_description: You're an average guy, traveling a Neon futuristic Wasteland. Survive the story between life, and the Seven levels of Death.
supported_languages:
English*, Bulgarian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian, Belarusian, Bosnian, Mongolian, Serbian, Uzbek
*languages with full audio support
